LanguageData.UF_ShowProcessIconTooltip: If enabled allows showing of process icon on buildings that have it enabled, otherwise will never show icons on buildings (default: true)
LanguageData.UF_ProcessIconSizeTooltip: Sets the size for the process icon that is shown on some processing buildings (default: 60%)
LanguageData.UF_ShowCurrentQualityIconTooltip: Shows an icon next to the progress bar that indicates the current quality of the product (default: true)
LanguageData.UF_ShowTargetQualityIconTooltip: Shows an icon next to the process icon that indicates the target quality set, only works if 'show process icon' is true (default: false)
LanguageData.UF_SingleItemIconTooltip: If enabled will use icons that resemble a single item, otherwise will use icons that resemble a full stack (default: true)
LanguageData.UF_SortAlphabeticallyTooltip: If enabled will sort list when clicking on the button to change process alphabetically, otherwise will sort by thingDef list (default: false)
LanguageData.UF_ReplaceVanillaBarrelsTooltip: Replaces all vanilla fermenting barrels for the UF ones, intended to be used after adding UF to an existing game, not multiplayer safe
LanguageData.UF_SetQualityDesc: Set the target quality for the process.
LanguageData.UF_OldBarrelInspectString: Old vanilla barrel, install it anywhere to replace it for universal fermenter
